results.title: The inhibition of spinal synaptic plasticity mediated by activation of AMP-activated protein kinase signaling alleviates the acute pain induced by oxaliplatin.
results.text_hl: Local application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly decreased the @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ and @GENE_RPS6KB1 @GENE_6198 @@@p70S6K@@@ activation induced by @<m>DISEASE_Tetany</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013746 @@@tetanus@@@ stimulation or @CHEMICAL_Oxaliplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077150 @@@oxaliplatin@@@ (i.p.).

citations.NLM: Ling YZ, Li ZY, Ou-Yang HD, Ma C, Wu SL, Wei JY, Ding HH, Zhang XL, Liu M, Liu CC, Huang ZZ, Xin WJ. The inhibition of spinal synaptic plasticity mediated by activation of AMP-activated protein kinase signaling alleviates the acute pain induced by oxaliplatin. Exp Neurol. 2017 Feb;288():85-93. PMID: 27856287
